      public void tweakAmount(Long bookId, int value) throws DaoException
      Description copied from interface: BookDao
      Changes Book's amount in the database based on inputted value
      Specified by:
      tweakAmount in interface BookDao
      Parameters:
      bookId - id of the Book in the database
